Summary: Bright Reddish/Orange circular soundless object approached from the Northeast sky in straight path veered left and was heading toward me then stopped and hovered
trends: There have been no other sightings in hartwell flying over lak
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi was grilling out----and saw an object approach flying steadily but slow above the tree tops about 1 to 2 thousand feet----was approaching from the north east sky over the lake heading on a straight course toward the east. the object appeared as a bright orange\reddish orb---appeared round in shape----i started walking toward the object and hid behind trees as i started approaching----then the object began to slow down almost as if it sensed i had spotted it-------the closer i got the slower it got-----i probably got within a 45 degree angle form the glowing object------then it stopped-(assumed it was hovering)-----was absolutely motionless------after approximately 5 seconds after it stopped------the light suddenly went out------and then i could not see it or hear anything-------there was never a sound to be heard from this object the whole time----it was as if the object discovered it had been witnessed and then suddenly vanished--------the whole event took app 2 minutes to possibly 3 minutes
